data.comment: The match has started at Philips Stadion.
Jafar Arias puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 22, Vito Van Crooij with an assist there.
Eindhoven have been awarded a penalty...
Philipp Max levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Philips Stadion.
Goal! Eindhoven take a 2-1 lead through a well-placed header from Olivier Boscagli.
In the minute 49, Great play from Philipp Max to set up the goal.
Mohammed Ihattaren, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Joel Piroe is the substitute for Eindhoven.
Great finish from Cody Gakpo to give Eindhoven a 3-1 lead.
In the minute 58, That's a fine assist from Chukwunonso Madueke.
The away team have replaced Torino Hunte with Tristan Dekker. This is the first substitution made today by Hans De Koning.
Venlo make their second substitution with Guus Hupperts replacing Lukas Schmitz.
In the minute 76, Hans De Koning (Venlo) is making a third substitution, with Joshua John replacing Evert Linthorst.
Adrian Fein is on a sub for Philipp Max for Eindhoven.
Sander van der Eijk blows to end the match. The final score is 4-1.
It's now 4-1 in Eindhoven as Olivier Boscagli scores for Eindhoven.
Chukwunonso Madueke instrumental with a fine assist.
